  • src.models.electricity.missing_element_demo

Source code for src.models.electricity.missing_element_demo

import pyomo.environ as pyo

m = pyo.ConcreteModel()

m.C = pyo.Set(initialize=['AB', 'BC', 'BE'], doc='superset of connections')

m.sub_C = pyo.Set(domain=m.C, initialize=['AB', 'BE'])

m.x = pyo.Var(m.sub_C)



[docs]
@m.Constraint(m.C)
def limit(m, c):
    if c in m.sub_C:
        return m.x[c] <= 5
    return pyo.Constraint.Skip



m.pprint()
